text: Yahweh Comforts Zion
“Listen to me, you who pursue righteousness,
who seek Yahweh.
Look to \add the\add* rock \add from which\add* you were hewn,
and to \add the\add* excavation of \add the\add* pit \add from which\add* you were quarried.
Look to Abraham your father,
and to Sarah; she brought you forth.
For I called him ⸤alone⸥,\f + \fr 51:2 \ft Literally “one” \f*
but\f + \fr 51:2 \ft Or “and” \f* I blessed him and made him numerous.”
For Yahweh will comfort Zion;
he will comfort all its sites of ruins.
And he will ⸤make⸥\f + \fr 51:3 \ft Literally “put” \f* its wilderness like Eden,
and its desert like the garden of Yahweh.
Joy and gladness will be found in it,
thanksgiving and \add the\add* ⸤sound⸥\f + \fr 51:3 \ft Literally “voice” \f* of song.
“Listen attentively to me, my people,
and my nation, listen to me!
For a teaching will go out from me,
and I will cause my justice to rest for a light to \add the\add* peoples.
My righteousness \add is\add* near; my salvation has gone out,
and my arms will judge \add the\add* peoples.
\add The\add* coastlands wait for me,
and for my arm they wait.
Lift up your eyes to the heavens
and look to the earth beneath,
for \add the\add* heavens will be torn to pieces like smoke,
and the earth will be worn out like \add a\add* garment,
and those who inhabit her will die like gnats.
But\f + \fr 51:6 \ft Or “And” \f* my salvation will be forever,
and my righteousness will not be broken to pieces.
Listen to me, you who know righteousness,
people \add who have\add* my teaching in their heart;
you must not fear \add the\add* reproach of men,
or be terrified because of their abuse.
For a moth will eat them like garments;
a moth will devour\f + \fr 51:8 \ft Or “eat” \f* them like wool,
but\f + \fr 51:8 \ft Or “and” \f* my righteousness will be forever,
and my salvation for ⸤generation after generation⸥.\f + \fr 51:8 \ft Literally “generation of generations” \f*”
Awake! Awake; put on strength, O arm of Yahweh!
Awake as \add in\add* days of long ago,
\add the\add* generations of a long time back!
\add Are\add* you not the one who cut Rahab in pieces,
\add the\add* one who pierced \add the\add* sea-dragon?
Are you not the one who dried up \add the\add* sea,
\add the\add* waters of \add the\add* great deep,
the one who ⸤made⸥\f + \fr 51:10 \ft Literally “placed” \f* \add the\add* depths of \add the\add* sea a way
for those who are redeemed to cross over?
So\f + \fr 51:11 \ft Or “And” \f* the redeemed ones of Yahweh shall return,
and they shall come \add to\add* Zion with singing,
and everlasting joy \add shall be\add* on their heads.\f + \fr 51:11 \ft Hebrew “head” \f*
Joy and gladness shall ⸤appear⸥;\f + \fr 51:11 \ft Literally “reach” \f*
sorrow and sighing shall flee away!
“I, I \add am\add* he who comforts you;
who \add are\add* you that\f + \fr 51:12 \ft Or “and” \f* you are afraid of man? He dies!
And of \add the\add* son of humankind? He is ⸤sacrificed⸥\f + \fr 51:12 \ft Literally “given” \f* \add as\add* grass!
And you have forgotten Yahweh, your maker,
who stretched out \add the\add* heavens,
and founded \add the\add* earth.
And you tremble continually, all day,
because of the wrath of the oppressor
when he ⸤takes aim⸥\f + \fr 51:13 \ft Literally “sets up” \f* to destroy.
But\f + \fr 51:13 \ft Or “And” \f* where \add is\add* the wrath of the oppressor?
\add The\add* fettered one shall make haste to be freed.
And he shall not die in\f + \fr 51:14 \ft Or “to” \f* the pit,
and he shall not lack his bread.
For\f + \fr 51:15 \ft Or “And” \f* I \add am\add* Yahweh, your God,
who stirs up\f + \fr 51:15 \ft Or “stirring up” \f* the sea, ⸤so that⸥\f + \fr 51:15 \ft Or “and” \f* its waves roar;
Yahweh of hosts \add is\add* his name.
And I have put my words in your mouth,
and I have covered you in the shadow of my hand,
to plant \add the\add* heavens
and to found \add the\add* earth,
saying to Zion, ‘You \add are\add* my people.’ ”
Rouse yourself! Rouse yourself!
Stand up, Jerusalem, who have drunk from the hand of Yahweh the cup of his wrath;
you have drunk the goblet, the cup of staggering;
you have drained \add it\add* out.
There is no one who guides her among\f + \fr 51:18 \ft Or “from” \f* all \add the\add* children she has borne,
and there is no one who grasps her by the hand among\f + \fr 51:18 \ft Or “from” \f* all \add the\add* children she raised.
Two \add things\add* here \add have\add* happened to you—who will ⸤show sympathy⸥\f + \fr 51:19 \ft Literally “wander” \f* for you?—
devastation and destruction, famine and sword—who will comfort you?
Your children have fainted;
they lie at \add the\add* head of all \add the\add* streets, like an antelope in\f + \fr 51:20 \ft Or “of” \f* a snare,
those who are full \add of\add* the wrath of Yahweh,
the rebuke of your God.
Therefore hear now this afflicted \add one\add*
and drunken \add one\add* but\f + \fr 51:21 \ft Or “and” \f* not from wine.
Thus says your Lord, Yahweh,
and your God pleads the cause \add of\add* his people:
“Look! I have taken from your hand the cup of staggering.
You shall not ⸤continue⸥\f + \fr 51:22 \ft Literally “do again” \f* to drink the goblet, the cup of my wrath, any longer.
And I will put it in the hand of your tormenters,
who have said to ⸤you⸥,\f + \fr 51:23 \ft Literally “your inner self” \f* ‘Bow down that\f + \fr 51:23 \ft Or “and” \f* we may ⸤pass⸥\f + \fr 51:23 \ft Or “stride” \f* over \add you\add*!’
And you have ⸤made⸥\f + \fr 51:23 \ft Literally “placed” \f* your back like the ground,
and like the street for those who ⸤pass⸥\f + \fr 51:23 \ft Or “stride” \f* over \add you\add*.”
